summary: This document is an email from Rafael Otoya to Richard regarding the status of a cash incentive related to new assets. It discusses the need for approvals due to the entity being an LLC and expresses gratitude for the opportunity to support Richard.

persons.name: Rafael Otoya
persons.context: Rafael Otoya is communicating about the status of a cash incentive and expresses gratitude for supporting Richard.

persons.name: Richard
persons.context: Richard is the recipient of the email and is involved in discussions regarding a cash incentive.

connections.description: Rafael Otoya is providing financial consulting services to Richard regarding a cash incentive.

locations: 4600 Alliance Gateway Freeway, Fort Worth, TX 76577
keyFacts: The cash incentive requires approvals due to the entity being an LLC.
Rafael Otoya is a Senior Financial Consultant at 1D Ameritrade.
The email expresses gratitude for the privilege of supporting Richard.
